description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Orbit One is an action packed, hyper-competitive multiplayer game played with just one button. Fly around a circular arena collecting orbs while avoiding enemies. Smash through your opponents for extra points!
description.short: Orbit One is an action packed, hyper-competitive multiplayer game played with just one button. Fly around a circular arena collecting orbs while avoiding enemies. Smash through your opponents for extra points!
